data.message: eminem is not a real rapper any more , he is rapping bout celebrities while they are not worth , use ur brain, try to explain people by voting wrong person , it will bring a real war ( i think in next 2 years all of us should listen to beautiful city , (sry eng is not my first language but its yours)

replies.message: He's a real artist, rapper!!! That's a matter of opinion

in that case , all those rappers who rap only bout weeds ,drugs , sex , and women as tools are artist too. i am sry for these people who listen to such dumb music and they enjoy it . some of them invite u to violence and fighting in street while same rappers are at safe home next to their family and they dont give a shit to those people who live outside . if he calls himself rap god , he has to do something. any way nowdays all of them are trash ( make more song to earn mote money)
That's like saying because Picasso hasn't painted a picture in a while he's no longer a painter!!! Shut the fuck up!

Sherry Loucks u changed the whole subject , i am saying there are more important things in real life that rappers should talk bout while they talk bout dumb things , if u havent seen pain in other countries , its not ur fault for not understanding . any way , enjoy ur beautiful life
